channel.title: A little help?
channel.description:
I completely FAIL Client-Sided, and I recently download a 614 sprite pack, and I wanted too create a spellbook, but I had one problem. The sprites. They weren't transparent. If anyone knows how to make sprites transparent please reply to this topic; Add me on msn (tehclawzfury@hotmail.com); Or Pm me.
Thanks :)
